particle.description: The particle type that will be spawned.
particle.markdownDescription: The particle type that will be spawned.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the particle will only be visible if this bi-entity condition is fulfilled by either or both the entity that has the power and the entity looking at the entity that has the power.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the particle will only be visible if this bi-entity condition is fulfilled by either or both the entity that has the power and the entity looking at the entity that has the power.

count.description: How much of the specified particle type will be spawned.
count.markdownDescription: How much of the specified particle type will be spawned.

speed.description: Determines the speed of the specified particle type.
speed.markdownDescription: Determines the speed of the specified particle type.

force.description: If set to `true`, the specified particle type that will be spawned can be seen from a far distance.
force.markdownDescription: If set to `true`, the specified particle type that will be spawned can be seen from a far distance.

spread.description: Determines the size of the three-dimensional cuboid volume to spawn the specified particle type in.
spread.markdownDescription: Determines the size of the three-dimensional cuboid volume to spawn the specified particle type in.

offset_x.description: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the X axis.
offset_x.markdownDescription: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the X axis.

offset_y.description: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Y axis.
offset_y.markdownDescription: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Y axis.

offset_z.description: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Z axis.
offset_z.markdownDescription: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Z axis.

type.description:
## Spawn Particles

---


[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/spawn_particles)

Spawns particles on the body of the entity that has the power for visual effects.

Type ID: `origins:spawn_particles`

---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:spawn_particles",
    "particle": {
        "type": "minecraft:block",
        "params": "minecraft:redstone_block"
    },
    "count": 16,
    "speed": 0.0,
    "force": true,
    "spread": {
        "x": 3.0,
        "y": 0.0,
        "z": 3.0
    }
}
```

This example will spawn a particle cuboid that is about 5x0x5 in size that will use the Redstone Block texture.

## Spawn Particles

---


[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/spawn_particles)

Spawns particles on the body of the entity that has the power for visual effects.

Type ID: `origins:spawn_particles`

---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:spawn_particles",
    "particle": {
        "type": "minecraft:block",
        "params": "minecraft:redstone_block"
    },
    "count": 16,
    "speed": 0.0,
    "force": true,
    "spread": {

        "y": 0.0,
        "z": 3.0
    }
}
```

This example will spawn a particle cuboid that is about 5x0x5 in size that will use the Redstone Block texture.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Spawn Particles (Entity Action Type) date: 2021-12-03

Spawn Particles

Entity Action Type

Spawns particles on the body of the entity that has the power for visual effects.

Type ID: origins:spawn_particles

Fields

Field Type Default Description
particle Particle Effect The particle type that will be spawned.
bientity_condition Bi-entity Condition Type optional If specified, the particle will only be visible if this bi-entity condition is fulfilled by either or both the entity that has the power and the entity looking at the entity that has the power.
count Integer How much of the specified particle type will be spawned.
speed Float 0.0 Determines the speed of the specified particle type.
force Boolean false If set to true, the specified particle type that will be spawned can be seen from a far distance.
spread Vector {"x": 0.5, "y": 0.5, "z": 0.5} Determines the size of the three-dimensional cuboid volume to spawn the specified particle type in.
offset_x Float 0.0 The offset of where the particle will be centered in the X axis.
offset_y Float 0.5 The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Y axis.
offset_z Float 0.0 The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Z axis.

Examples

"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:spawn_particles",
    "particle": {
        "type": "minecraft:block",
        "params": "minecraft:redstone_block"
    },
    "count": 16,
    "speed": 0.0,
    "force": true,
    "spread": {
        "x": 3.0,
        "y": 0.0,
        "z": 3.0
    }
}

This example will spawn a particle cuboid that is about 5x0x5 in size that will use the Redstone Block texture.
